es.content_calendly: ¡Genial! Hemos agendado tu cita con un asesor. Revisa tu correo para conocer la fecha, hora y detalles. Esperamos con ansias la oportunidad de ayudarte y brindarte la mejor asistencia.

en.content_end_register: Congratulations! You have successfully completed the registration form.
en.note_end_register: We will be validating your data, which may take up to 5 business days, but,don't worry! We will send you an email when it's ready.
en.content_modal: Congratulations! You have successfully completed the registration form.
en.content_modal_exist_email: {{preRegisterData.email}} is already registered in our system. Enter your mailbox and locate the,addressee: customer_service@tkambio.us to find your link and complete your registration on the platform. If you want personalized attention click on:
en.content_calendly: Great! We have scheduled your appointment with an advisor so you can solve all your queries and enjoy the various,benefits offered by our platform. Check your email, you will find the details of the meeting. See you soon!
